text: Ara amara apanara age'o janapadabasidera madhya theke [1] purusaderake'i pathiyechilama [2], yadera kache ohi pathatama. Tara ki yamine bhramana kareni? Phale dekhate peta tadera purbabartidera parinama ki hayechila? Ara abasya'i yara taka'oya abalambana kareche tadera jan'ya akheratera abasa'i uttama [3]; tabu'o ki tomara bujha na
